title: "Gravity's Canvas"
content:
# Gravity's Canvas

Welcome to Gravity's Canvas, a website dedicated to exploring the wonders of the universe through stunning digital imagery. Our collection features breathtaking photographs and illustrations that capture the beauty and mystery of space.

At Gravity's Canvas, we believe that the universe is a work of art, and our images showcase its most captivating masterpieces. From distant galaxies to planetary nebulae, our collection offers a glimpse into the vastness and complexity of the cosmos.

Our team of expert photographers and artists use cutting-edge technology and techniques to create images that are both scientifically accurate and visually stunning. Whether you're an astronomy enthusiast or simply appreciate beautiful imagery, Gravity's Canvas has something for everyone.

So come explore the universe with us and discover the hidden wonders of the cosmos.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A digital image of a black hole, with the distorted shapes and bright colors representing the extreme gravity."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
